titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2-Propenoic acid, polymer with diethenylbenzene.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 7/12/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the suspension, through December 31, 2008, of the duty on 2-Propenoic acid, polymer with diethenylbenzene.
